Desc.eng: When your father liberated Borgovia, he imprisoned the vampire princes in the Impossible Tombs. But somebody broke the seals on their crypts, so they are swarming back to Borgova. With vengeance, obviously.
Then I will close those fancy tombs again.
The Impossible Tombs are in a pocket realm of the Ink, where only the dead souls can go.
And how am *I* supposed to get there?
Don’t get ahead of ourselves. The said realm, which is called the Nightmare Hollow, can be accessed from here through unique Inkgates that only the mediums can open.
Splendid. Do you happen to know a good medium around here?
Umm.. I might know someone. A lady they call Fata Morgana, who once helped me, as a young ghost, to stay in the mortal world. She used to live on the circus island of the Dark Carnival.
